data.eml:eml: Hermit crabs (Decapoda: Crustacea) from deep Mauritanian waters (NW Africa) with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Matos-Pita, Susana S., Ramil, Fran (2015): Hermit crabs (Decapoda: Crustacea) from deep Mauritanian waters (NW Africa) with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 3926 (2): 151-190, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3926.2.1
